caption:
This photograph captures a vibrant outdoor scene with several people engaged in various activities. In the foreground, two women are in the middle of an activity involving a large piece of fabric or sack. The woman on the left, bending over, appears to be adjusting or spreading the fabric on the ground. She is wearing a colorful bikini paired with sports sneakers, and her long hair is down. The other woman to the right, standing and watching her companion, is in a similar colorful bikini and white-strapped sandals, accessorized with a wide-brimmed hat and sunglasses.

In the background, other individuals can be seen engaged in different casual activities. A man in denim shorts and without a shirt is walking by, and another is farther back, possibly working with some equipment. The setting is outdoors, with a backdrop of dense, lush green trees, suggesting a park or a recreational camping area.

Overall, this scene exudes a summery, carefree atmosphere, emphasized by the casual attire of the participants and the outdoor setting. The photograph likely captures a moment from a group outing or a similar social gathering.
title: Girls picking up litter along the Chattahoochee River. (From the Documerica-1 exhibition. For other images in this assignment, see fiche number 58.)
